en-US.name: Kids Spark Surprise Pack
en-US.summary: This is a surprize gift pack for your kid.
en-US.description: When your kid accumulate five thousand points you can buy gift of appriciation for your child with 4.99 dollars.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The gift pack will have few surprises.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the surprise gift pack.  Your gift will arrive soon!
